editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Trickier A Little to the Left

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

Build the perfect commute on your next commute with the hypnotic Mini Metro. Strategy buffs and casual gamers alike will enjoy expanding a busy transit system by linking stations, directing trains and upgrading lines. There’s a thrilling satisfaction in seeing underground lines come together—and since no two games play alike, we’re always trying out new designs.
editorialNotes.short: Construct the perfect commute in this underground masterpiece.

editorialNotes.standard: This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, you’ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. It’s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwo’s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

name: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Will you make it to the end?

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Take your footage to the next level with complete control over your camera’s focus, exposure, frame rates and more. It’s powerful on its own but built to support external mics, lens adapters and other tools, putting pro-quality videography at your fingertips.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Train up and compete in races!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: The ducks are ready to fight!

editorialNotes.standard: Dish out egusi, puff puff and other classic Nigerian dishes in this savoury tie-in with the animated series.
Talk about using your head! Gain the powers of skeletal warriors by swapping your skull with theirs in this challenging 2D action game.

The concept behind Kingdom Rush Frontiers is exceptionally simple: take the same great ideas, visual style, and fiendishly difficult tower defense that millions fell in love with in the original game and improve it by adding tons of incredible content. Frontiers packs new heroes, settings, towers, and tons of fresh enemies to fend off, making the frenzied action even harder to put down.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The latest in this gorgeous, long-running tower defence series adds cool twists, like playing with two heroes at once.

If you’re going to wage Total War, you better have a total strategy. Feral’s faithful port takes us right back to the amazingly complex battles of Rome. We can’t help but make alliances, purposely break them, then chase down our newfound enemies. It’s all fun and games, right? That is, until they get the upper hand…

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Deliver packages to rebuild a ravaged society – and unravel supernatural mysteries – in this wild post-apocalyptic adventure crafted by legendary game maker Hideo Kojima.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Something happened to your fellow children – and the only way to learn their fates is by sneaking past menacing shadows in this chilling 2D platformer.

ios.subtitle: A Trail of Light… And Fear
